name: leeq1d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))

stmt.origin: a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c0))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))

cumulated.origin:

comment: Specialization of ~ breq1d to reals and less than. (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 9-Mar-2020.)
